General.Name: Electric Car Company
General.Description: Electric Car Company, Inc. engages in the manufacture, distribution, and marketing of automobiles, small buses, specialty vehicles, limousines, and custom vehicles. It also distributes propane. The company was formerly known as Classic Costume Company, Inc. and changed its name to Electric Car Company, Inc. in October 2009. Electric Car Company, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Springfield, Missouri.
General.Address: 1903 North Barnes Avenue, Springfield, MO, United States, 65803
